Reviews.Title: sucks
Reviews.Author: Maribel estrada
Reviews.Content: This phone really sucks. Not at all what tge add n reviews say. Very fragile can not do anything with it.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.6-inch TFT LCD display
Dual SIM Card; 1.3MP Camera; Social Networking with Facebook, Twitter and eBuddy; Stereo FM radio; MP3 Player and Video Player; MP3 ringtones; 3.5mm Audio Jack and MicroSD slot upgradeable up to 8GB.
Games; Browser WAP 2.0/xHTML; SMS; MMS; Organizer; GPRS Class 12 (4+1/3+2/2+3/1+4 slots), 32 - 48 kbps; 256 MB ROM, 64 MB RAM Internal Memory and MicroUSB v2.0.
Talk time up to 3hrs 30min - Stand-by up to 72hrs.
This Unlocked Dual SIM Cell Phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint. Dual SIM Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 MHz (Both SIMs) plus GPRS/WAP data capabilities.
ProductInfo.Name: BLU S210 Deejay Touch Unlocked Dual SIM Quad-Band GSM Phone with 2.6-Inch Touchscreen, 1.3 Camera and Bluetooth - US Warranty - Black/Pink
